title: "Developing the Power of Will: Understanding the Distinction with Stubbornness"
first_phrase: In the previous text, the power and importance of the mind were explored. Now, the focus is on the distinction between stubbornness and the true strength of willpower. The author explains that it is not enough to simply claim to possess strong willpower, as true strength is measured by the ability to influence and dominate the minds of others. The presence of a person with a determined will can command respect and fear without even speaking, and developing this power is achieved by forming the determination to achieve a certain result. The text emphasizes the importance of understanding and harnessing the true potential of the mind.
content: La verdadera fuerza de la voluntad se mide del poder que se está alcanzando en el gobernar a los otros, y en el adquirir dominio sobre la mente de aquellos con los cuales ella está en relación, además que de la medida de los resultados paragonados a aquellos de los otros. A menudo, la presencia de un hombre que tiene una voluntad fuerte y determinada, tiene impresionante temor y respeto. No es necesario que ellos hablen. No tiene necesidad de pronunciar una palabra. Cualquier cosa invisible es emanada del, y esta cualquier cosa comanda un mayor respeto que todas las palabras que se podrían pronunciar. Podrá desarrollar inmensamente su potencia de voluntad, con formar la determinación de alcanzar un cierto resultado.
last_phrase: Developing a strong will requires the determination to achieve certain results and putting it into practice at all costs. However, it is important to start with things that are possible to accomplish and build from there. By consistently following through with your thoughts and turning them into actions, you can strengthen your willpower and achieve greater success in life.
